name: Add history to DB

topic: SELECT h.id, h.rfid, u.nama, h.akses FROM history h JOIN user u ON h.nama = u.rfid ORDER BY h.id DESC;

name: Change time from DB
Get history from DB
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT h.id, h.rfid, u.nama, h.akses " +
            "FROM history h " +
            "JOIN user u ON h.nama = u.rfid " +
            "ORDER BY h.id DESC;"

return msg;

Get user from DB

topic: SELECT * FROM user ORDER BY sign_in DESC;

name: Change time from DB
Get user from DB
Add user to DB
Delete user from DB
List access user last 1 hour
Get history last 1 hour
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT h.id, h.rfid, u.nama, h.akses " +
            "FROM history h " +
            "JOIN user u ON h.nama = u.rfid " +
            "WHERE h.akses >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR;"

return msg;

name: Get history last 1 week
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT h.id, h.rfid, u.nama, h.akses " +
            "FROM history h " +
            "JOIN user u ON h.nama = u.rfid " +
            "WHERE h.akses >= NOW() - INTERVAL 7 DAY;"

return msg;

name: Get history last 1 day
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT h.id, h.rfid, u.nama, h.akses " +
            "FROM history h " +
            "JOIN user u ON h.nama = u.rfid " +
            "WHERE h.akses >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;"

return msg;

name: Get history last 1 month
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT h.id, h.rfid, u.nama, h.akses " +
            "FROM history h " +
            "JOIN user u ON h.nama = u.rfid " +
            "WHERE h.akses >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH;"

return msg;
